seo.title: The Manchester Social | Premium Tattoo Studio Manchester
seo.description: Manchester's premier tattoo studio offering custom designs, traditional & modern styles. Expert artists, sterile environment. Book your consultation today.

openGraph.title: The Manchester Social - Premium Tattoo Studio

Tattoo Collective

hero.imageAlt: The Manchester Social tattoo studio interior

portfolio.subtitle: From bold traditional pieces to intricate fine line work, every tattoo tells a story

sessions.subtitle: Professional tattoo services tailored to your vision

testimonials.quote: The Manchester Social created the perfect sleeve for me. Alex's attention to detail is incredible and the studio atmosphere is so welcoming.
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell

testimonials.quote: Best tattoo experience I've ever had. Professional, clean, and the artwork exceeded my expectations. Already planning my next piece!
testimonials.author: James Rodriguez

paragraphs: Founded in the heart of Manchester's creative quarter, The Manchester Social is more than just a tattoo studio – we're a community hub where art, creativity, and authentic connections flourish. Our mission is to create exceptional tattoos while fostering genuine relationships with every client who walks through our doors.

Led by award-winning artist Alex Thompson, our studio combines traditional tattooing techniques with contemporary artistry. We believe every tattoo should be a collaborative masterpiece, reflecting your unique story while showcasing our commitment to exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story. Let us help tell yours.
about.imageAlt: Alex Thompson, lead artist at The Manchester Social

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 3-4 weeks in advance for regular sessions, and 6-8 weeks for larger pieces. However, we occasionally have last-minute availability, so don't hesitate to reach out.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Every consultation includes design discussion, sizing and placement advice, aftercare instructions, and a detailed quote. We'll work together to ensure your vision comes to life perfectly.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Start Your Tattoo Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the Manchester Social community and get the tattoo you've always dreamed of

booking.modalDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your booking
